column1: XML Sitemap helps the search bot index the pages including those that might have been ignored otherwise. An XML sitemap is written for the search bots (as opposed to the HTML Sitemap that is created for the real clients).
column2: XML Sitemap helps the search bot index the pages including those that might have been ignored otherwise. An XML sitemap is written for the search bots (as opposed to the HTML Sitemap that is created for the real clients).

column1: Сrops the identifier (like /home/) from the homepage URL and sends its priority to the highest (1.0).
column2: Сrops the identifier (like /home/) from the homepage URL and sends its priority to the highest (1.0).

column1:
List of links to append to the XML Sitemap. Link without 'http[s]://' will be treated as relative to this domain.
NOTE! http:// is required in case the page is on some other website.
column2:
List of links to append to the XML Sitemap. Link without 'http[s]://' will be treated as relative to this domain.
NOTE! http:// is required in case the page is on some other website.

column1: Sort the pages on your store only according to their importance. Won't affect your site rankings among other websites. Valid values range from 0.0 to 1.0.
column2: Sort the pages on your store only according to their importance. Won't affect your site rankings among other websites. Valid values range from 0.0 to 1.0.

column1: Select No if you are using the specific literal characters in the URLs.
